review: Good value for money.  It was what I expected and received it quicker than expected

review: great little contraption. Easy to install and use!
author: moet45

review: Love this device, and don't need a gaming system to binge watch all my fav netflix series. Awesome!!
author: Jennifer Thompson

review: Nice things:Great setup experience!Bad things:Big quality difference in youtube, netflicks, etc. when compared to streaming from Xboxs, computers, etc. I understand that it because it is wireless, but the wireless convenience is not worth the dip in quality of video. The videos get cropped too.Things to note:Projecting a tab works fine. Although, you need a good machine to keep up. So, using a light weight tablet does not work too well.Did not try playing any local content from my laptop/tablet.
author: Karl Buhariwala

review: An awesome piece of hardware. So much potential in such a tiny package. It disappears behin your TV or receiver and is really easy to setup and use.
author: N. Hasan
